response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which holds immense value and significance for both parties involved. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence and innovation. Given its worth to you, I propose a special introductory offer of $14,500 for this remarkable product. This price reflects my commitment to making high-quality offerings accessible while ensuring a fair return on my investment. I believe this is a mutually beneficial arrangement that respects the value you place on this product. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 14500}
